__e: I think that you should be with him at all times since he is the head of state, and you are his successor.
But he does seem pretty confident that he will be your successor.
We have already informed you of our final decision. You cannot succeed us as a leader of this clan.
A new job in which successors of Majesty ... You will probably be the best pay for.
I shall submit the name of who I...
Before I close my eyes, please vow to recognize my son as the Prince. Swear by the Sun.
The guy who's replacing me, he won't want to come and talk to you like I do.
You think if she sees who her replacement's gonna be, she'll change her mind about coming back?
I've been searching for a replacement for Dr. Brennan, and it's been a half a year.
Sounds like it's not going to be easy to find someone to take her place.
Word is out, they want you to replace donovan. And they won't take no for an answer.
But certainly, I think we can all agree that it'd be a good idea to have a successor.
I was willing to forgive him, make him my successor, despite the fact he was a bastard.
Our man won't confide or deal with your successor, he wants you.
Oh. Well, do you know who's running the lighthouse now?
May I ask who was chosen to replace me?
I know that's not possible, m'lady, but if you could just tell me who's replaced him...
